alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BENTON...NORTHERN DELAWARE AND SOUTHEASTERN OTTAWA COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of South West City to 3 miles north of Maysville to 6 miles north of Colcord. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Bentonville... Jay... Bella Vista... Grove... Gravette... Decatur... Highfill... Bernice... Springtown... Maysville... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Honey Creek State Park... Bernice State Park... Hiwasse... Miller... Centerton... Dodge... Cayuga... Lake Eucha State Park... Vaughn... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 91 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Oklahoma.
